actions.description: A girl smiling and waving hello to the camera.
The girl gives a thumbs down with a disappointed expression.
The girl claps her hands excitedly and nods approvingly.
The girl puts a finger on her chin, looking upwards thoughtfully.
The girl widens her eyes and covers her mouth in surprise.
The girl jumps slightly and pumps her fists in celebration.
The girl looks away with a disgusted expression, scrunching her nose.

description: This is a webshop focused on footwear. Users can see various shoe listings along with product descriptions and prices. Interactive elements include shopping features and options to add items to the cart.
